alert.name: CPU - Dapr Sidecar for Validation Worker app alert

panels.title: CPU - Dapr Sidecar for Validation Worker app

alert.message:
Alert on metric "lh_hashtag_counter_binding_duration".  This metric measure the duration between the message analyzer app's send to the binding and the hashtag counter's corresponding receive.

See http://dapr-grafana.080759c65e46489fa9b5.westus2.aksapp.io/ for the dashboard.
alert.name: lh_hashtag_counter_binding_duration

panels.description: "lh_hashtag_counter_binding_duration".  This metric measures the duration between the message analyzer app's send to the binding and the hashtag counter's corresponding receive.
panels.title: lh_hashtag_counter_binding_duration

alert.name: CPU - Dapr Sidecar for Snapshot app alert

panels.title: CPU - Dapr Sidecar for Snapshot app

alert.message:
This metric is used to determine if stats changed between snapshots performed by the validation worker app.  It is expected that stats should change.  When this happens, the app emits a 0 for this metric (normal).  When it does not, it emits 1 (signalling error).

See the dashboard at http://dapr-grafana.080759c65e46489fa9b5.westus2.aksapp.io/
alert.name: lh_validation_worker_stats_unchanged alert

panels.description: This metric is used to determine if stats changed between snapshots performed by the validation worker app.  It is expected that stats should change.  When this happens, the app emits a 0 for this metric (normal).  When it does not, it emits 1 (signalling error).
panels.title: lh_validation_worker_stats_unchanged

alert.message: SnapshotActorMethodFailureCount (lh_snapshot_actor_method_failure_count) - the number of failures invoking actor methods from the Snapshot app has exceeded the limit.
alert.name: Panel Title alert

alert.message: MessageAnalyzerBindingFailureCount (lh_message_analyzer_binding_failure_count) - the number of failures calling the output binding exceeds the limit.
alert.name: MessageAnalyzerBindingFailureCount alert

alert.message: HashtagCounterActorMethodFailureCount (lh_hashtag_counter_actor_method_failure_count) - the number of failures from the Hashtag Counter app invoking actor methods is above limit.
alert.name: HashtagCounterActorMethodFailureCount alert

alert.message: PublishAPIFailures  (lh_feed_generator_publish_failure_count) - the number of publish error from the Feed Generator app is above limit.
alert.name: PublishAPIFailures alert

alert.message:
This is the duration from the point the feed generator  publishes to the point the message analyzer receives it.  Said another way, this also represents the time from the beginning of the pipeline to the next app in the pipeline.

This alert currently is signaled if the metric has a value over 1 second.

See dashboard at http://dapr-grafana.080759c65e46489fa9b5.westus2.aksapp.io/
alert.name: PubSubDuration

panels.description: This is the duration from the point the feed generator  publishes to the point the message analyzer receives it.  Said another way, this also represents the time from the beginning of the pipeline to the next app in the pipeline.
panels.title: lh_message_analyzer_pubsub_duration

alert.message:
This notification is sent when the "lh_snapshot_actor_delay_since_last_snapshot" metric is over the limit.  The limit is currently 12, and may need to be fine tuned.

The metric measures the time between the snapshot app's successful snapshots of data held by hash tag actors.  Note there is also an intentional delay between queries from the snapshot app to the hash tag actors, so that must be taken into account when setting the limit for this alert.

See dashboard at: http://dapr-grafana.080759c65e46489fa9b5.westus2.aksapp.io/
alert.name: lh_snapshot_actor_delay_since_last_snapshot alert

panels.description:
This notification is sent when the "lh_snapshot_actor_delay_since_last_snapshot" metric is over the limit.  The limit is currently 12, and may need to be fine tuned.

The metric measures the time between the snapshot app's successful snapshots of data held by hash tag actors.  Note there is also an intentional delay between queries from the snapshot app to the hash tag actors, so that must be taken into account when setting the limit for this alert.
panels.title: lh_snapshot_actor_delay_since_last_snapshot
